scripts.extension: vite build --outDir dist_extension && mkdir ./dist_extension/tictactoe_spiral && mv ./dist_extension/assets/content_script.*.js ./dist_extension/assets/content_script.js && mv ./dist_extension/assets/App.*.css ./dist_extension/assets/App.css && mv ./dist_extension/assets ./dist_extension/tictactoe_spiral/assets && cp background.js content_script.js ./dist_extension
scripts.peer: cross-env-shell PORT=18765 ROOT_PATH=./radata_18765 'cd ../peer && rm -rf ./radata_18765 && pnpm start-dev'
scripts.e2e-deps: cross-env-shell IS_TEST=1 bun run build && cross-env-shell IS_TEST=1 concurrently "bun run peer" "bun run serve --port 13700" "bun run serve --port 13701"
